text: Pisary () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Międzylesie, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately south-east of Międzylesie, south of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital Wrocław. ==Notable residents== * Hans Iwand (1899 – 1960), German Lutheran theologian ==References== Pisary
title: Pisary, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
